title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4101.9 - Accounting system of tracks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4101.9 - Accounting system of tracks

State Regulations

All associations and corporations licensed under the

Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law to conduct harness race meetings
at which pari-mutuel betting is permitted must adopt the uniform system of
accounts that has been furnished such licensees by the
commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4101.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
